subject: Travel Policy - Gold Coverage
body:
I need travel insurance:
- Outbound trip
- Scope: Worldwide Excluding USA and Canada
- Plan: Gold ($100,000)
- Duration: 14 days
- Dates: 2025-12-01 to 2025-12-14
- 2 travellers
- Traveller 1: Jane Smith, Passport: CD9876543
- Traveller 2: Tom Smith, Passport: EF5432109

Please confirm.
